database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Integrated proteomic analysis of post-translational modifications by serial enrichment.
entry.description: Mertins P, Qiao JW, Patel J, Udeshi ND, Clauser KR, Mani DR, Burgess MW, Gillette MA, Jaffe JD, Carr SA. Nat Methods 2013, 10, 634-7. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.2518.
